text:
Hey, I think im going to apply for free folk internship, with all my holidays been cancelled over the summer probably be worth trying, done quite a bit of work especially this year that I think I've got some decent stuff for a showreel.

I'm going to have a go, worst that can happen is I get declined that's it. They extended the deadline to 3rd May giving me a little bit of time to put a showreel together, I've got some stuff I think is decent and I'll probably send you it to get your approval before I apply. I want to at least have a chance.
